ciqttaM caq cittiqScA &&*kU#taqM cA&&*kU#tiScaq vij~jA#taM ca viqj~jAna#M caq mana#Scaq Sakva#rIScaq dar.Sa#Sca pUqrNamA#saSca bRuqhacca# rathantaqraM ca# praqjApa#tiqrjayAqnindrA#yaq vRuShNEq prAya#cCaduqgraH pRu#taqnAjyE#Shuq tasmaiq viSaqH sama#namantaq sarvAqH sa uqgraH sahi havyO# baqBUva#dEvAsuqrAH saM~Mya#ttA 
Asaqnthsa indra#H praqjApa#tiqmupA# ( ) dhAvaqt tasmA# EqtA~jjayAqn prAya#cCaqt tAna#juhOqt tatOq vai dEqvA asu#rAnajayaqnaq. yadaja#yaqn tajjayA#nAM jayaqtva(gg) sparddha#mAnEnaiqtE hO#taqvyA# jaya#tyEqva tAM pRuta#nAM || 15
(upaq - pa~jca#vi(gm)SatiSca) (A4)
